mapper.select:
SELECT types, brand, num_color, announced_time, market_position, chip_platform, chip_freq, AP, num_freq, price, look_type, thickness, weight, num_screen, size_screen, ratio, touch_screen, keyboard_type, RAM, ROM, Flash, camera, positions, FM, TV, modem, infrared, bluetooth, wlann, battery, gravity, direction, num_text_method, intelli_sys
FROM datas
mapper.insert:
insert into datas (id, types, brand, num_color, announced_time, market_position, chip_platform, chip_freq, AP, num_freq, price, look_type, thickness, weight, num_screen, size_screen, ratio, touch_screen, keyboard_type, RAM, ROM, Flash, camera, positions, FM, TV, modem, infrared, bluetooth, wlann, battery, gravity, direction, num_text_method, intelli_sys) values
( #{datas.id}, #{datas.types}, #{datas.brand}, #{datas.numColor}, #{datas.announcedTime}, #{datas.marketPosition}, #{datas.chipPlatform}, #{datas.chipFreq}, #{datas.ap}, #{datas.numFreq}, #{datas.price}, #{datas.lookType}, #{datas.thickness}, #{datas.weight}, #{datas.numScreen}, #{datas.sizeScreen}, #{datas.ratio}, #{datas.touchScreen}, #{datas.keyboardType}, #{datas.ram}, #{datas.rom}, #{datas.flash}, #{datas.camera}, #{datas.positions}, #{datas.fm}, #{datas.tv}, #{datas.modem}, #{datas.infrared}, #{datas.bluetooth}, #{datas.wlann}, #{datas.battery}, #{datas.gravity}, #{datas.direction}, #{datas.numTextMethod}, #{datas.intelliSys} )
